COBRA Coverage and Options Through Pennie | pennie.com.  
          
        
When you lose job-based insurance, you may be offered COBRA continuation coverage by your former employer.


If youre losing job-based coverage and havent signed up for COBRA, learn about your rights and options under COBRA from the 
Pennsylvania Insurance Department
.


If you decide not to take COBRA coverage, you can enroll in a plan through Pennie instead. Losing job-based coverage qualifies you for a Special Enrollment Period. This means you have 60 days to enroll in a health plan, even if its outside the annual 
Open Enrollment Period
.
